thread.title: Mozambican theater commemorates Swedish author Mankell
thread.title_full: Mozambican theater commemorates Swedish author Mankell

title: Mozambican theater commemorates Swedish author Mankell
text:
> Entertainment Mozambican theater commemorates Swedish author Mankell The front page of a Mozambican newspaper with a portrait of Swedish author and crime writer Henning Mankell and headline "An Eternal Gratitude". Mozambicans have paid tribute to the late Mankell who worked in theater and contributed to charity in Mozambique as it struggled to recover from decades of war. Mankell died Oct. 5 in Sweden after a battle with cancer. (AP Photo/Jane Flood) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team!
